title: COSORI Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo 13-in-1, 32Qt APP & Voice Control Convection Oven Countertop, Bake, Broil, Roast, Dehydrate, Sous Vide, 134 Recipes & 4 Accessories, Black, Stainless Steel
description: COSORI 12-in-1 Smart Air Fryer Rotisserie Toaster Oven Functions: Control Way- *Voice Control-Work with Alexa& Google Assistant; *APP Control-VeSync *Digital Control-Knob 12 Functions- *Air Fry, Rotisserie, Dehydrate, Pizza, *Roast, Toast, Bagel, Bake, *Broil, Cookies, Ferment, and Keep Warm. Specifications: Time Range: 0-24 hr Rated Power: 1800W Power Supply: AC 120V, 60Hz Temperature Range: 80°F - 450°F / 27°- 232°C Capacity: 32qt / 30L; 5-pound rotisserie whole chicken, 6-Slice Toast, 13-inch pizza Recipe Book: 100 original paper cook book Dimension & Material: Toaster Oven- Material: Stainless Steel+ Non-stick Coating Exterior Dimension: 20.1 x 16.5 x 12.1 inches(L x W x H) Interior Dimension: 14.1 x 13.8 x 9.4 inches(L x W x H) Item Weight: 27.3 lb / 12.4 kg (including accessories) Accessories- Fry Basket: Steel + Chrome Plating -14.1 x 11.8 x 1.1 inches (L x W x H) Wire Rack: Steel + Chrome Plating – 14.1 x 12.8 inches (L x W x H) Food Tray: Steel + Non-stick Coating – 14.0 x 11.9 x 1.1 inches (L x W x H) Crumb Tray: Galvanized Steel - 14.1 x 11.9 x 1.1 inches (L x W x H) Rotisserie Fork Set: Steel + Chrome Plating –13.8 x 2.6 x 1.3 inches (L x W x H) Rotisserie Handle: Steel + Black coating – 12.9 x 12.8 x 0.7 inches (L x W x H) Certifications: Toaster Oven-ETL Listed; Non-stick Coating-BPA Free, PFOA Free Note: Before First Use- *Recommended running the Toast function to eliminate any residue or traces of odor after shipping; *The oven features Automatic Preheat in some presets; * Hot appearance. Never place it under cabinet. Cleaning- *Always clean the oven and its accessories after every use; *Always leave the crumb tray at the bottom of oven while cooking; *Only Food Tray is dishwasher safe. Helpful Service- *Enjoy 1 year assurance and addition 1 year from Cosori; *Please reach to our helpful Southern California based Customer Support Team for any assistance on this oven.
